rooms.description: A spacious living room designed with an open Bohemian style layout featuring natural light and a mix of traditional and modern elements. The design aligns with Vastu principles by placing the entrance in the northeast, ensuring positive energy flow.
A cozy dining space integrated with the living area. It features a Bohemian flair with eclectic decor and natural materials, fostering an inviting atmosphere while respecting Vastu alignments.
A well-equipped kitchen designed for both functionality and style. It incorporates a spacious layout and natural light with south-facing windows to align with Vastu recommendations.
The master bedroom offers privacy and comfort. It is positioned in the northwest corner to ensure tranquility and stability, aligning with Vastu principles.
A well-appointed bedroom that provides a relaxing space. It is located in the northeast region to harness positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
A functional bedroom that balances modern design with traditional elements. Its placement in the northwest aligns with Vastu principles for promoting calmness and balance.
A dedicated area designed as a study or workspace. The room's design incorporates natural lighting, comfortable seating, and minimal clutter in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
A compact bathroom strategically located to ensure privacy while maintaining good drainage as per Vastu norms. It is accessible from multiple bedrooms.

openings.description: The main entrance is placed in the northeast, promoting positive energy entry into the home as per Vastu recommendations.
A sliding glass door leading to the rooftop terrace, designed for maximum natural light and ventilation while maintaining a secure connection between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooftop_terrace.description: An expansive, open rooftop terrace designed to provide relaxation space with an urban Bohemian aesthetic. It features comfortable seating areas, greenery integration, and a view that aligns with Vastu principles of harmony.
